buildings.name: Palace
abilities: Government Center: Provides administrative bonuses to the city.

buildings.name: Granary
abilities: Food Storage: Increases [Food] storage capacity.

buildings.name: Monument
abilities: Cultural Heritage: Provides a bonus to [Culture] generation.

buildings.name: Barracks
abilities: Military Training: Increases [Battle Experience] for units trained in the city.

buildings.name: Library
abilities: Knowledge Preservation: Provides a bonus to [Science] generation.

buildings.name: Shrine
abilities: Religious Center: Allows the founding of a religion.

buildings.name: Market
abilities: Trade Hub: Increases [Trade Route] capacity and [Gold] generation.

buildings.name: Walls
abilities: Fortification: Increases city defense strength.

buildings.name: Amphitheater
abilities: Entertainment: Provides [Amenities] to the city.

buildings.name: Water Mill
abilities: Improved Irrigation: Increases [Food] production from the city's [Farms].

buildings.name: Temple
abilities: Religious Devotion: Provides a bonus to [Faith] generation.

buildings.name: Workshop
abilities: Improved Craftsmanship: Provides a bonus to [Production].

buildings.name: Courthouse
abilities: Law and Order: Increases [City Stability] and reduces [Corruption].

buildings.name: Harbor
abilities: Coastal Trade: +1 Trade Route capacity.
Fishing Grounds: Provides additional food for coastal cities.

buildings.name: Stable
abilities: Cavalry Training: Increases [Production] of [Cavalry] units.

buildings.name: Aqueduct
abilities: Water Supply: Increases [City Growth] and provides fresh water.

buildings.name: Colosseum
abilities: Entertainment: Provides a significant boost to [Amenities] and [Culture].

buildings.name: University
abilities: Advanced Learning: Provides a significant bonus to [Science] generation.

buildings.name: Armory
abilities: Military Production: Increases [Production] and [Battle Experience] for [Militant] units.

buildings.name: Marketplace
abilities: Trade Expansion: Increases [Gold] generation and [Trade Route] capacity.

buildings.name: Castle
abilities: Fortified Defense: Increases [City Defense] strength and provides a military bonus.

buildings.name: Guild Hall
abilities: Trade Connections: Increases [Trade Route] capacity and provides a bonus to [Gold] generation.
Guild Training: Increases [Production] of [Civilian] units.

buildings.name: Monastery
abilities: Religious Community: Provides a significant bonus to [Faith] generation and [Culture].
Monastic Learning: Generates [Science].

buildings.name: Shipyard
abilities: Naval Construction: Increases [Production] of [Militant Naval] units.
Naval Training: Increases [Battle Experience] for [Militant Naval] units trained in the city.

buildings.name: Opera House
abilities: Cultural Performance: Provides a significant boost to [Culture] and [Amenities].

buildings.name: Arsenal
abilities: Military Manufacturing: Increases [Production] and [Battle Experience] for [Militant] units, and provides [City Defense].

buildings.name: Bank
abilities: Financial Institution: Increases [Gold] generation and [Trade Route] capacity.

buildings.name: Observatory
abilities: Scientific Observation: Provides a significant bonus to [Science] generation.

buildings.name: Printing Press
abilities: Information Dissemination: Increases [Culture] and reduces [Policy] cost.

buildings.name: Custom House
abilities: Coastal Trade: Significantly increases [Gold] generation and [Trade Route] capacity in [Coastal] cities.

buildings.name: Shipyard
abilities: Naval Construction: Increases production of naval units.
Naval Training: Increases experience for naval units trained in the city.

buildings.name: Theater
abilities: Dramatic Performances: Provides [Culture] and [Great Work of Literature] and [Great Work of Art] slots.

buildings.name: Mint
abilities: Currency Stabilization: Increases [Gold] generation and [City Stability].

buildings.name: Factory
abilities: Mass Production: Greatly increases [Production] in the city and provides additional [Great Engineer Points].

buildings.name: Coal Power Plant
abilities: Electricity Generation: Provides a large amount of [Power] to the city, increasing [Production] and other yields.

buildings.name: Stock Exchange
abilities: Market Boom: Increases [Gold] generation and [Trade Route] capacity, boosting the city's economy.

buildings.name: Research Lab
abilities: Advanced Research: Significantly increases [Science] output, accelerating technological progress.

buildings.name: Broadcast Center
abilities: Mass Media: Provides [Amenities] and increases [Culture], influencing the city's [Population] and [Tourism].

buildings.name: Museum
abilities: Cultural Exhibits: Generates [Culture] and [Tourism].
Archaeological Missions: Can launch archaeological missions to acquire [Artifacts].

buildings.name: Hospital
abilities: Healthcare: Provides [Amenities] and reduces [Disease] in the city.
Medical Research: Generates a small amount of [Science].

buildings.name: Police Station
abilities: Law Enforcement: Increases [City Stability].
Precinct: Provides [Production] and [Gold].

buildings.name: Hydro Plant
abilities: Renewable Energy: Provides a substantial amount of [Power] to the city without consuming resources.

buildings.name: Airport
abilities: Air Travel: Increases [Tourism] and provides [Amenities], connecting the city to the world.

buildings.name: Stadium
abilities: Sporting Events: Provides a large amount of [Amenities], improving the city's quality of life.

buildings.name: Modern University
abilities: Higher Education: Increases science output and provides great scientist points, fostering research and development.

buildings.name: Supermarket
abilities: Food Distribution: Provides [Food] and [Amenities], improving the city's standard of living.

buildings.name: Nuclear Power Plant
abilities: Nuclear Energy: Provides a massive amount of [Power] to the city, but carries the risk of [Nuclear Meltdown].

buildings.name: Modern Research Lab
abilities: Advanced Research: Further increases [Science] output, accelerating technological progress.

buildings.name: Intelligence Agency
abilities: Espionage Operations: Provides additional [Spy] slots and increases the effectiveness of [Espionage Operations].

buildings.name: Missile Silo
abilities: Nuclear Deterrent: Allows for the construction and storage of nuclear weapons.

buildings.name: Seaport
abilities: Modernized Port: Increases [Gold] and [Production] from international [Trade Routes] in [Coastal] cities.

buildings.name: Broadcast Tower
abilities: Global Communication: Further increases [Culture] and [Amenities], influencing a wider area.

buildings.name: Military Base
abilities: Strategic Defense: Provides a strong [Defense} bonus to the city and increases military production.

buildings.name: Electronics Factory
abilities: Advanced Manufacturing: Increases [Production] and generates [Science], driving technological advancement.

buildings.name: Internet Hub
abilities: Global Network: Increases [Science] and [Gold] generation, connecting the city to the global information network.

buildings.name: Data Center
abilities: Information Processing: Enhances [Science] and [Production], reflecting the era's focus on data processing and automation.

buildings.name: Spaceport
abilities: Space Exploration: Enables the construction of space-related projects, such as satellites and space stations.

buildings.name: Advanced Research Lab
abilities: Cutting-Edge Research: Further boosts [Science] output and provides [Great Scientist Points], driving innovation.

buildings.name: Cybersecurity Center
abilities: Digital Defense: Enhances [City Defense] against [Cyber] attacks and increases espionage capabilities.

buildings.name: Tea House
abilities: Cultural Influence: Increases [Cultural Influence] over [Puppeted], [Conquered] or [Neighbouring] cities.
Loyalty Bonus: Provides a [Loyalty] bonus of 15% to the city.

buildings.name: Dojo
abilities: Unit Training: Units trained in this city gain additional [Battle Experience].
Defense Bonus: Provides a [Defense] bonus of 15% to the city.

wonders.name: Great Pyramids
wonders.quote: Soldiers, from the summit of these pyramids, forty centuries look down upon you.

wonders.name: Hanging Gardens
wonders.quote: The Hanging Gardens are a true wonder.

wonders.name: Temple of Artemis
wonders.quote: Of all the marvels I have seen, the Temple of Artemis is the most magnificent.

wonders.name: Colossus
wonders.quote: The Colossus was a masterpiece of art.

wonders.name: Oracle
wonders.quote: Know thyself.
wonders.quoter: Inscribed at the Oracle of Delphi

wonders.name: Stonehenge
wonders.quote: The wisest men follow their own direction.

wonders.name: Great Lighthouse
wonders.quote: The sea is the universal highway.

wonders.name: Terracotta Army
wonders.quote: The art of war teaches us to rely not on the likelihood of the enemy's not coming, but on our own readiness to receive him.

wonders.name: Apadana
wonders.quote: The Apadana: a hall where the might of the Persian Empire was displayed.

wonders.name: Statue of Zeus
wonders.quote: The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.

wonders.name: Mausoleum at Halicarnassus
wonders.quote: Time is the wisest counselor of all.

wonders.name: Great Bath of Mohenjo-daro
wonders.quote: Civilization is a stream with banks. The stream is sometimes filled with blood from people killing, and the banks sometimes erode.

wonders.name: Amphitheatre of El Djem
wonders.quote: Give them bread and circuses, and they will never revolt.

wonders.name: Temple of Amun
wonders.quote: Religion is regarded by the common people as true, by the wise as false, and by the rulers as useful.

wonders.name: Great Library of Alexandria
wonders.quote: The true wealth of a nation lies not in its gold or silver, but in its learning, wisdom, and the uprightness of its sons.

wonders.name: Meteora
wonders.quote: The soul never thinks without a picture.

wonders.name: Petra
wonders.quote: The art of getting rich consists... in preserving capital and putting it to the best advantage.

wonders.name: Chichen Itza
wonders.quote: The best index to a person's character is how he treats people who can't do him any good, and how he treats people who can't fight back.

wonders.name: Huei Teocalli
wonders.quote: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.

wonders.name: Circus Maximus
wonders.quote: In war, events of importance are the result of trivial causes.

wonders.name: Temple of Confucius
wonders.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.

wonders.name: Forum of Trajan
wonders.quote: It is not enough to conquer; one must also learn to seduce.

wonders.name: Pergamon Altar
wonders.quote: The aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of things, but their inward significance.

wonders.name: Basilica Cistern
wonders.quote: Water is the principle, or the element, of everything.

wonders.name: Ajanta Caves
wonders.quote: The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven.

wonders.name: Hagia Sophia
wonders.quote: O Lord, surely this is thy house, and this is thy gate of heaven.

wonders.name: Notre Dame
wonders.quote: The most terrible and splendid of all the Churches built by the hand of man.

wonders.name: Alhambra
wonders.quote: Give him alms, woman, for there is nothing sadder in life than being blind in Granada.

wonders.name: Angkor Wat
wonders.quote: The only constant is change.

wonders.name: Borobudur
wonders.quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.

wonders.name: Great Zimbabwe
wonders.quote: The value of a man should be seen in what he gives and not in what he is able to receive.

wonders.name: University of Bologna
wonders.quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.

wonders.name: Mont Saint-Michel
wonders.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.

wonders.name: Krak des Chevaliers
wonders.quote: He who wishes to secure the good of others has already secured his own.

wonders.name: Chartres Cathedral
wonders.quote: You are Peter, and on this rock I will build my church, and the gates of Hades will not overcome it.

wonders.name: Brihadeeswarar Temple
wonders.quote: Let there be peace and prosperity in the land.

wonders.name: Temple of Literature
wonders.quote: A country will become prosperous if it is fond of education.

wonders.name: Gur-e Amir
wonders.quote: With Heaven's aid, I have conquered the world.

wonders.name: Machu Picchu
wonders.quote: Earth provides enough to satisfy every man's needs, but not every man's greed.

wonders.name: Forbidden City
wonders.quote: Let the Emperor's will be known throughout the land.

wonders.name: St. Peter's Basilica
wonders.quote: The glory of God's house is built for all time.

wonders.name: Taj Mahal
wonders.quote: If there is paradise on earth, it is this, it is this, it is this.

wonders.name: University of Sankore
wonders.quote: Knowledge is the most precious thing, and the wisest man is he who seeks it.

wonders.name: Globe Theatre
wonders.quote: All the world’s a stage, and all the men and women merely players.

wonders.name: Topkapi Palace
wonders.quote: The power of the Sultan is absolute.

wonders.name: Shwedagon Pagoda
wonders.quote: May the light of the Buddha illuminate the world.

wonders.name: El Escorial
wonders.quote: I did not send you to school to make theologians of you; you must learn to govern the state.

wonders.name: Uffizi Gallery
wonders.quote: Art is the queen of all sciences communicating knowledge to all the generations of the world.

wonders.name: Château de Chambord
wonders.quote: Architecture should have no other aim but to put in concrete form the spirit of its time.

wonders.name: Frauenkirche (Dom zu Unserer Lieben Frau)
wonders.quote: A mighty fortress is our God.

wonders.name: Potala Palace
wonders.quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.

wonders.name: Saint Basil's Cathedral
wonders.quote: Better than beauty, better than grandeur, is the charm of simplicity.

wonders.name: Himeji Castle
wonders.quote: One must proceed with caution.

wonders.name: Eiffel Tower
wonders.quote: France was for her a vast picture of delight.

wonders.name: Statue of Liberty
wonders.quote: Give me your tired, your poor, your huddled masses yearning to breathe free.

wonders.name: Big Ben
wonders.quote: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.

wonders.name: Panama Canal
wonders.quote: I took the canal zone and let Congress debate.

wonders.name: Trans-Siberian Railway
wonders.quote: The railway is the greatest instrument of human progress.

wonders.name: Oxford University
wonders.quote: The aim of the university is to enable keen and original minds to develop to their full potential.

wonders.name: Neuschwanstein Castle
wonders.quote: I intend to remain a perpetual mystery to myself and to others.

wonders.name: Brooklyn Bridge
wonders.quote: The bridge will be the eighth wonder of the world.

wonders.name: Palace of Westminster
wonders.quote: Let parliament be ever vigilant.

wonders.name: Hagi Reverberatory Furnace
wonders.quote: To build a strong nation, we must forge the tools of progress.

wonders.name: Empire State Building
wonders.quote: The skyscraper is the symbol of capitalism.

wonders.name: Golden Gate Bridge
wonders.quote: The bridge is a poem wrought in steel.

wonders.name: United Nations Headquarters
wonders.quote: We have to learn to live together as brothers or perish together as fools.

wonders.name: Broadway
wonders.quote: The theatre is a place where one can learn about life.

wonders.name: Cristo Redentor
wonders.quote: Christ the Redeemer, a symbol of hope and peace.

wonders.name: Hoover Dam
wonders.quote: Every man who has shown the world the way to do something new has been called a crank at first.

wonders.name: Mount Rushmore
wonders.quote: There is nothing permanent except change.

wonders.name: International Space Station
wonders.quote: To confine our attention to terrestrial matters would be to limit the human spirit.

wonders.name: The Kremlin
wonders.quote: The Kremlin is the heart of Russia.

wonders.name: The Pentagon
wonders.quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.

wonders.name: Conseil Européen pour la Recherche Nucléaire Headquarters
wonders.quote: The pursuit of knowledge for its own sake, an almost fanatical love of justice and the desire for personal independence—these are the features of the Jewish tradition which make me thank my stars that I belong to it.

wonders.name: National Aeronautics and Space Administration Headquarters
wonders.quote: That's one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind.

wonders.name: Sydney Opera House
wonders.quote: The aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of things, but their inward significance.

wonders.name: Global Seed Vault
wonders.quote: The Seed Vault is the ultimate insurance policy for the world's food supply.

wonders.name: Silicon Valley
wonders.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.

wonders.name: Three Gorges Dam
wonders.quote: Man must control nature.
